content:
In other words,
Every time you head out, it's a different adventure!
And you'll find different treasures too.
info: 莎莎素材星相关闲聊_莎莎

content:
Traveling can be super——wild!
The turbulent flow might sweep you away
to all sorts of bizarre bubble worlds.
info: 莎莎素材星相关闲聊_莎莎

content:
When you don't know where to go,
just let randomness decide your path,
it'll be suuuper fun!... But don't tell Mobai!
info: 莎莎素材星相关闲聊_莎莎
